name: small pelagic fish to generic market for marine fish | marine fish | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19177/documentation

This is a linking (transfering) activity which links pelagic fish, to the generic market for marine fish. Pelagic fish are a by-catch of tuna fishing. By-catch of tuna includes all non-target fish species that are captured during the fishing of tuna. As they have a market value they are linked to the market for marine fish.

The activity starts with the reception of landed hake.

The activity models the part of pelagic fish which contributes to the generic market for marine fish.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing
